text: The men's large hill individual ski jumping competition for the 1994 Winter Olympics was held in Lysgårdsbakken. It occurred on 20 February. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" ! Rank !! Bib !! Athlete !! Country !! Jump 1 !! Jump 2 !!
